name: Vice & Dice
description:
Vice & Dice was made for GTMK game jam 2022. The theme was “Roll of the Dice” so I built a game focused on using dice as projectiles.

Controls: Move with arrow keys, jump with space, look with mouse, shoot with left mouse, scope in with right mouse.

Known Issues: ...

ToDo: Audio, More Menus, Better Collision Detection?

This was made by BatmenzDW
